Original Release Date: January 10, 2006

Eric Bibb (born August 16, 1951) is an American acoustic blues singer-songwriter. He is based in London and launched his career in Europe
Eric Bibb is one of the greatest Blues aficionados of the 21st century. This collection of 15 tracks includes 2 new recordings of classic tracks and is a true accolade to his career with such classics as 'Saucer & Cup' & 'Needed Time'. This is the definitive album from this master of modern day blues. .
